data.title: Seeking Immortality Through Art
data.meta_description: If you had to ask me what I categorise as my most defining feature, I would say: I am mostly someone who fears death. It has been (less lately) for years my most persistent thought. But also, I would…
data.text:
If you had to ask me what I categorise as my most defining feature, I would say: I am mostly someone who fears death. It has been (less lately) for years my most persistent thought. But also, I would tell you that since infancy I have loved to create. Drawing, writing, photographing, putting down creative thoughts. Forcing myself to be able to leave a mark on the world. And I know, I am no Artist, but I have always seen art as the exit wound to the problem. The caveat, the “I could settle for this”. A way of forever moving through time.

Communication and Love as Recipe for Immortality
